entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
